Posts.Content: Thankyou everyone.im actually here on behalf of my sister.she seems in a very scary place right now.shes had her lump removed(TWICE as they got it wrong)and is awaiting to hear the next stage.seein her today was hard as shes usually such a happy go licky person yet today he was sown..really down:0( she said she is tired beyond belief.i have given her my login details and will hope she uses them.dont like to ask such personal questions,ur all such strong ladies entering this journey in life,but how do u manage/cope/keep ya spirts up??xxx

Posts.Content: hi.not sure if im posting in the right place,but have so many questions.x
